quest.name: Leves of Wineport
journal: Aileen, the Adventurers' Guild representative for local levequests in Wineport, is seeking an adventurer to undertake guildleves.
In order to gauge your ability to handle the various guildleves she has to offer, Aileen requires that you carry out a preliminary task.
You have successfully completed the trial guildleve. Report to Aileen in Wineport.

Aileen is now confident that you are capable of handling any of the trials and tribulations you might encounter around Wineport. Prove your worth as an adventurer, and continue to undertake the guildleves she has to offer.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: Looking for work to fund our wine habit, are we?

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: The Adventurers' Guild has assigned me to Wineport so that I might distribute guildleves to the willing and able.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: Depending on what skills you possess, I may have suitable work for you. Beast culling, crafting, gathering, and so forth.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: That said, my offer is contingent upon you first demonstrating your capacity to complete a contract.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: The La Noscean wilderness is fraught with peril, so it behooves me to test your ability to survive in it.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: While these goobbues are wont to devour anything and everything, they have a fondness for pelican meat.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: Your task will be to slay a pelican and use its remains to lure out the ravenous goobbues.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: The area in which the goobbues were last sighted is fairly large, so this may take a fair amount of time. Be warned, however, that other hungry creatures may be drawn to the meat.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: I believe I've explained your task in sufficient detail. If you have any further questions, refer to the guildleve in your possession.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: Oh, you actually completed the trial. I suppose you'll be wanting this, then.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: So it's begun. Good. I look forward to hearing of your success.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: You've proven yourself competent, which is well. If you desire additional guildleves, I will not deny you.

dialogue.name: AILEEN
dialogue.text: You can drink whilst you work for all I care. As long as the client is satisfied, so am I.
